definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
comet from Saturn, traditionally described as yellow/evil omen
to accumulate gold and jewels (idiom); prosperous
wicker door, hole window (idiom); fig. wretched hovel/living in poverty
to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)

lunar apogee (point in the moon's orbit furthest from earth)/imaginary heavenly body occupying the second focus of the moon's elliptic orbit/dark moon/Lilith
The Artificer's Record, a technology treaty compiled towards the end of the Spring and Autumn period
Mashan county in Nanning 南寧|南宁[Nan2 ning2], Guangxi
abbr. for 四個現代化|四个现代化[si4 ge4 xian4 dai4 hua4], Deng Xiaoping's four modernizations
